name: website
description: The public website of EasyEyes project.

scripts.update:git: git add -A && git commit -m 'update' && git push
scripts.update:sub: cd docs/threshold && npm run update:git && cd ../..
scripts.update:phrases: cd docs/threshold/threshold && npm run phrases && cd ../../.. && npm run git 'update phrases' 2
scripts.update:glossary: cd docs/threshold/threshold && npm run glossary && cd ../../.. && npm run git 'update phrases' 2
scripts.update:fetch: cd docs/threshold/threshold && npm run fetch && cd ../../.. && npm run git 'update fetch' 2
scripts.netlify: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd docs/threshold && npm run netlify

author: EasyEyes
